Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at Jackson due to an earlier door problem. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at Jackson due to an earlier door problem.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st Temporary Reroute at 31st/Wallace
ShortDescription: #35 31st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Wallace, 35th and Halsted, due to police activity near 31st/Wallace.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Wallace, 35th and Halsted, due to police activity near 31st/Wallace.

Allow extra travel time.
